title: sogasu nI
sahitya:
sogasu nI sommu kalyANi rAgiNI vagalu virajam munu nA bhAva jAlamulO 


anupallavi

  ningipai paikegasi Alapincaga navanItamE candrikAla kincE tAra lUgE taraNOdayam bayye


caraNam    dharaNI talambupai Alapincaga nEnu taruNi manasulu vacce jAji rOjAlavale madhumatta 
nayanamulu maimaraci aramODce vidhisilpa cAturI garima mincE sudhalu vIcE muraLI ravaLI hAyi
